<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '200': {
      description: 'The status of the API.',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            properties: {
              status: { type: 'string' },
              error: { type: 'string', nullable: true },
              uptime: { type: 'number', format: 'double' },
              timestamp: { type: 'number', format: 'double' },
              version: { type: 'string' },
            },
            required: ['status', 'error', 'uptime', 'timestamp', 'version'],
            type: 'object',
            additionalProperties: false,
            title: 'IStatus',
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
